Name: Applique of a black with a monkey
Description: This applique in bronze with gilded decoration shows, from the front, a  black man wearing a remarkable outfit which has been detailed with care. He carries a basket and has a monkey on the left shoulder; this may indicate that he was part of a procession of tributaries. The piece, which probably served as ornamentation at the base of a column in a temple, dates from the New Kingdom.
